mapper.select: SELECT notice_idx , notice_title , notice_content , date_format(notice_regdate, '%y-%m-%d') as notice_regdate , notice_img , notice_viewcnt , notice_file , notice_filename FROM notice WHERE notice_idx=#{noticeIdx}

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM notice
WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%') OR notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%')
WHERE notice_status=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM , RN.* FROM (
SELECT notice_idx , notice_title , notice_content , date_format(notice_regdate, '%y-%m-%d') as notice_regdate , notice_viewcnt FROM notice
WHERE (notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%') OR notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%')) AND notice_status = 1
WHERE notice_status=1
ORDER BY notice_regDate DESC ) RN, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) tmp ) SUB WHERE SUB.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}

SELECT notice_idx FROM notice WHERE notice_idx IN(
(SELECT notice_idx AS PREVNUM FROM notice WHERE notice_idx < #{noticeIdx} AND notice_status = 1 ORDER BY notice_regDate DESC LIMIT 1)
, (SELECT notice_idx AS NEXTNUM FROM notice WHERE notice_idx > #{noticeIdx} AND notice_status = 1 ORDER BY notice_regDate ASC LIMIT 1) )
